summary:
##  Cleanup & Deep Scan Safety + Responsiveness

###  Installer & UI Responsiveness
- Added `/NORESTARTAPPLICATIONS` to installer launch so Restart Manager no longer auto-restarts TidyWindow (fixes ghost “Setup” in Alt-Tab)
- Preview hydration now stays **off the UI thread**, batching work with `Task.Yield` to keep setup->preview smooth
- Deletion phases yield more frequently to keep confirmation -> deletion -> celebration transitions responsive

---

###  System Path Safety (Major Hardening)
- Introduced shared **CleanupSystemPathSafety** classifier for OS-critical paths
- Cleanup and Deep Scan now rely on the shared classifier (old ad-hoc root checks removed)
- Explicit validation added: null/empty paths, traversal detection, safe normalization, root-only checks
- Supports runtime extension of protected roots
- Added comprehensive unit tests for critical, traversal, and edge cases

---

###  Deep Scan Guardrails
- Added **Allow system paths (dangerous)** toggle for scanning, with confirmation and hazard styling
- Added **Allow system deletions (dangerous)** toggle for deletion, fully independent from scanning
- System paths are:
  - Skipped during scan unless explicitly allowed
  - **Always blocked from deletion** unless system deletions are enabled
- Status messages clearly report when protection blocks actions
- Removed old “System” filter and grouped dangerous options together

---

###  Delete Flow Improvements
- Both normal and force delete now block when system deletion is disabled
- Lower-level delete helpers enforce system-path gating consistently
- Added per-item delete progress:
  - “Deleting…” state with indeterminate progress bar
  - Delete/Force Delete buttons disable while active
- Force delete continues to honor ownership, retry, and delete-on-reboot logic

---

###  PathPilot & Cleanup Stability
- Inventory refresh and switch operations run in background tasks with **timeouts + linked cancellation**
- Navigation cancels in-flight work to prevent lingering load
- Centralized cancellation management ensures clean disposal
